oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Impact of Preventive Hoof Care on Dairy Heifer Performance
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Scharko, P. B.
Davidson, T. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Northern climate
hoof growth
indoors
pens
tie-stalls
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Northern climate can place many restrictions on how to raise heifers and these restrictions can have an important effect on hoof growth. Heifers in northern climates are raised indoors during the winter months. They are either grouped with other heifers of similar size in pens or they are placed in tie-stalls.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 164-165
